        var comment = this.getParameter('sysparm_comment');
        var sysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');

        var rec = new GlideRecord('incident'); // Replace with your table
        if (rec.get(sysId)) {
            rec.setValue('state', 'rejected_state_value'); // Set the state to rejected
            rec.setValue('u_rejection_comment', comment); // Save the comment
            rec.update();
            return 'success';
        }
        return 'failure';
    },


    type: 'CustomStateChange'
});]]></script>
